# Accountancy
## Master of Accounting
Share
## Take your accounting career to the next level
Designed for professionals who want to put their accounting career on the fast track, this program examines the evolving and increasingly important role of accounting in global business. You will engage in thought-provoking case studies and practical research to build advanced expertise in auditing, financial accounting and reporting, taxes, management accounting and more.
The program is fully customizable. Shape your experience to match your goals, whether you want a career in auditing or fraud investigation, tax compliance or estate planning, nonprofit or governmental accounting, education or other areas.
This respected degree program is one of few accounting master’s programs in the world accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business International.
##### Overview
College:
[College of Business and Economics](https://www.uidaho.edu/business-economics)
Duration:
2 years, 33 credits
Locations:
Moscow, Coeur d'Alene
## Related Topics
[Business](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder#topics=Business)[Data](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder#topics=Data)[Data](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder#topics=Data)[Math](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder#topics=Math)
## Accelerate your accounting career
Close All
Degree fit
This program could be a good fit if you:
  * Enjoy working with numbers.
  * Like to solve problems and puzzles.
  * Have a strong work ethic.
  * Are detail-oriented.
  * Like working with technology.
  * Want broad career pathways.


Career outcomes
## Current job openings
4,555 in ID, WA, OR, MT and HI
## Potential careers and mid-career salaries
  * Treasurers and Controllers • Financial Managers   
$150,860
  * Accountants and Auditors   
$85,746
  * Financial Examiners   
$91,302
  * Tax Examiners, Tax Collectors, and Revenue Agents   
$68,823
  * Tax Preparers   
$49,028


View all careers 
[Career Services](https://www.uidaho.edu/career-services "U of I Career Services")
* Career data provided by 
Financial aid and scholarship opportunities
**Financial aid**
Paying for college can feel overwhelming, but U of I’s Financial Aid Office is here to help. Our experienced financial aid counselors can assist you in exploring financial aid options, making informed financial decisions and addressing common concerns.
For information on FAFSA deadlines, financial aid types and eligibility requirements, visit the University of Idaho [Financial Aid Office](https://www.uidaho.edu/financial-aid) website.
Plan ahead — estimate your cost of attendance with [U of I’s Cost Calculator](https://www.uidaho.edu/financial-aid/cost-of-attendance).
Clubs and involvement opportunities
**Hands-on learning**
You have many hands-on learning opportunities to ensure your readiness for the real business world as an accounting student. These interactive programs give you practical experience and business know-how that will set you apart.
Accounting hands-on learning opportunities include:
  * **Barker Review Group:** Serve as the officials and account review team for the Barker Trading Competition.
  * **U of I Internal Controls Review:** Work with the U of I controller’s office to review the internal controls over the cash receipting process of university decentralized units.
  * **Volunteer Income Taxation Assistance (VITA):** Prepare tax returns for low-income individuals.


Application information
Applicants for the Master in Accountancy program must meet the following admission requirements:
  * Education level: Bachelor's
  * GPA: 3.0
  * GRE: No
  * TOEFL/IELTS: 88/6.5
  * Number of references: 3
  * Other requirements: No


Visit [Graduate Admissions](https://www.uidaho.edu/admissions-apply/graduate-students) to learn more and start your application.
[Apply to grad school - Start your application ](https://futurevandals.uidaho.edu/apply/)
#### Request more information
## Related degrees
### [Accountancy | Audit and fraud examination emphasis (M.Acct.)](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accountancy-audit-fraud-examination-macct)
Gain expertise in auditing, taxes, reporting and more — tailored to your goals with a Master of Accountancy, audit and fraud examination emphasis.
[View degree details](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accountancy-audit-fraud-examination-macct)
### [Accountancy | Taxation emphasis (M.Acct.)](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accountancy-taxation-macct)
Advance your career with a globally respected Master of Accountancy with a taxation emphasis. Build expertise in taxation, financial reporting and compliance.
[View degree details](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accountancy-taxation-macct)
### [Accounting (B.S.Bus.)](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accounting-bsbus)
Earn your Bachelor of Science in business accounting at U of I and gain the skills needed for a successful career in finance, auditing and tax management.
[View degree details](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/accounting-bsbus)
### [Mathematics (Ph.D.)](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/math-phd)
Discover how to use sophisticated mathematical techniques to address challenges in business, economics, public policy and scientific research with a Doctor of Philosophy in mathematics.
[View degree details](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/math-phd)
### [Mathematics (M.S.)](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/math-ms)
Learn how to apply advanced mathematical principles to solve problems in industry, the economy, government and science with a Master of Science in mathematics.
[View degree details](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder/math-ms)
[Explore all](https://www.uidaho.edu/academics/degree-finder)

# Accountancy | Audit and fraud examination emphasis
## Master of Accounting
Share
## Become an expert in accounting
If you’re ready to elevate your accounting career, this graduate program offers the tools and training to help you lead in today’s evolving global economy. Designed for working professionals, the program explores the growing influence of accounting in international business and prepares you with advanced skills in areas like auditing, financial reporting, taxation, cost analysis and more.
Built for flexibility, this degree lets you focus on what best fits your career goals — whether that’s forensic accounting, corporate tax planning, nonprofit or government finance, education or compliance and regulation.
Recognized worldwide, this highly respected program is one of a select few accounting master’s degrees accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business, the gold standard in business education.
##### Overview
College:
[College of Business and Economics](https://www.uidaho.edu/business-economics)
Duration:
2 years, 30 credits
Locations:
Coeur d'Alene, Moscow
## Related Topics
